description:
Warmer than your favourite hoodie, and great for layering, this jacket is a welcome layer on chilly mornings or shady campsites. Made from a 100% recycled lightweight fleece, the Synchilla jacket bring the cozy.

  • Double-sided fleece has an anti-pilling finish, dries quickly, and wicks away moisture
  • Recycled nylon on collar and chest-pocket flap is wind resistant
  • Elastic binding on cuffs and hem seals out drafts
  • 3 zippered pockets give you a secure place for your daily necessities
  • Relaxed fit has a casual, all day comfort
name: Patagonia Synchilla Jacket - Women's
